about.title: About SmartSetu
about.paragraph1: At SmartSetu, we believe that everyone deserves a fair chance to grow, succeed, and be recognized. Our platform is designed to unlock opportunities for individuals and small businesses who are often left behind in the traditional financial system.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to bridge the gap between ambition and opportunity, so that every vendor, small entrepreneur, and community member can build a stronger, more secure future.
about.imageAlt: A diverse team collaborating in a modern office

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: SmartSetu is a digital platform that helps small vendors and entrepreneurs access fair loans and financial opportunities. We use innovative scoring methods like Alt-Score and Risk Score to go beyond traditional CIBIL checks, giving everyone a chance to prove their potential.
faq.a2: SmartSetu is designed for small business owners, street vendors, and self-employed individuals who may not have a formal credit history but need quick access to loans and financial tools.
faq.q3: How does SmartSetu decide loan eligibility?
faq.a3: We calculate your loan eligibility using Alt-Score and Risk Score, which consider UPI transactions, repayment history, and business stability. Based on your profile, you get a fair loan limit with transparent EMI and repayment details.
faq.q4: Is my data safe with SmartSetu?
faq.a4: Yes. We follow strict security practices and only use your data to improve your loan eligibility and provide you better services. Your information is never shared without your consent.

reasons.positive: Positive factors like these increase your score, showing financial stability and reliability to lenders.
reasons.negative: Negative factors like these can lower your score, indicating potential risks to lenders. Addressing them can improve your financial health.

tips.complete: Your score is an estimate. Providing all your financial details will give our AI a complete picture, leading to a more precise score and better loan options.
tips.upi: Higher UPI usage shows lenders that your business has consistent, digitally-verifiable income, which is seen as a major sign of stability.
tips.cibil: A good CIBIL score is crucial for larger loans. Start by getting a credit card or a small loan and paying it back on time to build a positive record.
tips.pan: A PAN card is a key identity document. Uploading it helps us verify your identity and credit history, which can significantly improve your score.
tips.cashflow: Showing that your income is consistently higher than your expenses is the most important factor for lenders. It proves your business is profitable and can handle loan repayments.
tips.default: Following this tip can help improve your score over time.

reasons.cash: Lenders see high cash usage as a risk because it's harder to verify your income digitally. More digital transactions build trust.
reasons.cashflow: When expenses are higher than income, it signals financial instability, which is a major concern for loan providers.
reasons.loan: An existing loan means you already have repayment obligations, which can affect your ability to handle new debt.
reasons.duration: Newer businesses are often seen as less stable. A longer track record helps prove your business's reliability.
reasons.cibil: Without a credit history, it's difficult for lenders to predict your repayment behavior, which increases their risk.
reasons.assets: Owning assets like a house or shop can act as security and shows stability, reducing the lender's risk.
reasons.default: This factor influences your financial risk profile.
